ygData.msgSnippet: The nanobots had already been working on bringing down the dome, so just one more bite or whatever would have probably taken it down. Also, only plates of the

The nanobots had already been working on bringing down the dome, so
just one more bite or whatever would have probably taken it down.

Also, only plates of the outer shell and stuff are in the pile that
collapsed. The rest of the CF is built into the Element, I think.

::Cledar/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer::

Cledar yelled in surprise as three streams of flame covered him, doing
more damage then pain, and then two shots hit him in the chest and
send him flying backwards. Two missiles fly above his head, and he
jumps up and sends a wave of plasma at Sinnertwin.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Two missiles nearly hit Rixer, the bot turning to see a group firing
at Cledar. He fires two missiles at Rippersnapper and runs toward
Cledar to see if he was allright.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Forrior, having been riding at Megatron (I think that's what Jen had
him doing), turns sideways to stop abruptly, and fires a wave of
plasma at Blot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Blyer continues to fly above Firestorm, waiting for the two missiles
he had fired earlier to hit or miss.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Rippersnapper ---
> 
> Seeing his current... uhh... buddies attacking another bot, he 
> decides to join in. "Rippersnapper want to crush too!" he fires four 
> missiles at Cledar.
> 
> 
>

as

transformed

of
